title: A Mage's Guide to Aussie Terrors
description: One ghost from the past.Two unknown Australian monsters eating people.Three men who wonâ€™t let either problem win.Tags:Familiars of choice, healing old wounds, Australian mythology, yes Nico and Wicky are in Australia, that goes about as well as anyone expects, giant amphibians of unusual size, even the MAD research department is stumped, Wicky may have summoned Godzilla, in his defense he was left unsupervised, conversations via air guitar, the next time they have to travel to a different continent Bel is drugging Nico first
author: A.J. Sherwood
